meanings.definition: Confined to one's home due to illness or disability.
meanings.sent1: The housebound patient eagerly awaited the visit from the nurse.
meanings.sent2: My housebound neighbor enjoys gardening in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The housebound cat watched the birds outside with envy.
meanings.sent4: The housebound artist found solace in painting the world beyond her window.
meanings.sent5: The housebound child longed to play with friends in the park.

meanings.definition: Unable to leave one's house due to physical or mental limitations.
meanings.sent1: Being housebound, she relied on grocery delivery services for her needs.
meanings.sent2: The housebound man missed attending his favorite community events.
meanings.sent3: The housebound dog barked at the mailman from the window every morning.
meanings.sent4: The housebound tree stretched its branches towards the sky, unable to explore the forest.
meanings.sent5: The housebound student used online classes to continue learning from home.
